hero.headline: XX99 MARK II HEADPHONES
hero.action: Experience natural, lifelike audio and exceptional build quality made for the passionate music enthusiast.

primary.action: Upgrade to premium speakers that are phenomenally built to deliver truly remarkable sound.

closing.headline: BRINGING YOU THE BEST AUDIO GEAR
closing.action: Located at the heart of New York City, Audiophile is the premier store for high end headphones, earphones, speakers, and audio accessories. We have a large showroom and luxury demonstration rooms available for you to browse and experience a wide range of our products. Stop by our store to meet some of the fantastic people who make Audiophile the best place to buy your portable audio equipment.

footer.about: Audiophile is an all in one stop to fulfill your audio needs. We're a small team of music lovers and sound specialists who are devoted to helping you get the most out of personal audio. Come and visit our demo facility - weâ€™re open 7 days a week.
